meanings: (Am) vacation season, (Brit) holiday season, the holidays

vlive.korean: 휴가 중 방 어떻게 나누는 거냐고? How do we separate our rooms during vacation? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 기오브
vlive.english: How do we separate our rooms during vacation?

vlive.english: That's the most fun out the vacations, right?

vlive.korean: [휴가 2일차] 짜잔~ [2nd day] Ta-da. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마
다음 휴가 때요? On your next vacation? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 54

examples.korean: a romantic weekend getaway in New York 발음듣기 뉴욕에서 애인과 보내는 주말 휴가 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a romantic weekend getaway in New York 발음

examples.korean: We have holidays to suit every purse. 발음듣기 저희에게는 모든 주머니 사정에 맞는 휴가 상품들이 있습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We have holidays to suit every purse. 발음

examples.korean: For me, the holiday was sheer unadulterated pleasure. 발음듣기 내게 있어서 그 휴가는 정말 완전한 기쁨이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: For me, the holiday was sheer unadulterated pleasure. 발음

examples.korean: Hotel costs gobbled up most of their holiday budget. 발음듣기 호텔비가 그들의 휴가 경비 대부분을 순식간에 잡아먹었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hotel costs gobbled up most of their holiday budget. 발음

examples.korean: to be in holiday mode 발음듣기 휴가 기분에 젖어 있다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to be in holiday mode 발음
